p: The majority of patients reported how they cherished life in the face of COVID-19-related illness. P2: "Life can suddenly disappear in a moment, you have to live well today. Your fate belongs to your family and you have to live well." They reported realization of the happiness and importance of family members and changed their attitude to money and rights as examples. P10: "Family members did not abandon me or give up on me when it was my most difficult time. I am very happy. They are the most important. What is the use of money, power, and status when you do not have life?"
